site.description: Hello, I am Kevin Kandlbinder, a developer and hobby photographer from northern Germany.

project.title: Project
project.description: This is what I am working on or have worked on.

about.title: About
about.donationCatchphrase: Like what you're seeing? Consider donating.

social.title: Social
social.descriptionWithLink: Find me on other platforms or <1>visit my friends</1>!

friends.title: Friends
friends.description: In this list you can find friends of mine and this site. Feel free to check them out for more interesting projects.

donate.title: Donate
donate.description: Hey! It looks like you're thinking about donating to me. That's nice of you! If you want your donation to go towards a specific project, feel free to write your wishes into the donation comment.
donate.thanksText: I really appreciate you appreciating my work and showing it! Feel free to mail me at <1>{{contactEmail}}</1> if you have anything you want to talk about!
donate.gitHub: You can very easily support me via GitHub Sponsors using the following button!
donate.payPal: If you'd rather support me via PayPal the following button is for you:

blog.name: Blog
blog.description: Read all about my exciting life!

general.name: General
general.description: This and that and everything in between.

scambox.name: Scambox
scambox.description: Take a dive with me into all of the scams I get on the daily, and maybe laugh at them a little!

not_found.title: Not Found
not_found.text: Whoops... That page doesn't exist, so you may as well <1>go home</1>.
